item.title: Discover the Secret to Silencing Facebook Messenger Calls on Your iPad!
item.description: Introduction Facebook Messenger is a popular messaging app that allows users to make and receive calls, send and receive messages, and share photos, videos, and audio messages. It is available on both mobile and desktop devices, including iPhones and iPads. Unfortunately, if you’re using an iPad, you may find that Messenger calls can be quite intrusive and disruptive. In this blog post, we’ll show you how to silence Facebook Messenger calls on your iPad.
